alert.note: Alert for Madison; Union (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 6:39PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EASTERN CHAMPAIGN COUNTY IN WEST CENTRAL OHIO, NORTHEASTERN MADISON AND SOUTHERN UNION COUNTIES IN CENTRAL OHIO THROUGH 715 PM EDT... At 639 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Mechanicsburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph, half inch hail, and frequent cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Locations impacted include... Dublin, Marysville, Plain City, Mechanicsburg, North Lewisburg, New California, Milford Center, Woodstock, Unionville Center, Cable, Rosedale, State Route 4 at State Route 161, US Route 33 at US Route 42, Watkins, Chuckery, New Dover and Mingo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
